titleStmt.title: Truths defence, or, The pretended examination by John Alexander of Leith of the principles of those (called Quakers) falsly termed by him Jesuitico-Quakerism, re-examined and confuted : together with some animadversions on the dedication of his book to Sir Robert Clayton, then Mayor of London / by G.K.
titleStmt.author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
